# Figure 1 Human
### a) bulk volcano
```{r bulk_volcano}
# a) bulk volcano
allComparisons <- c("sepsis_vs_control")
for (i in allComparisons) {
  group1_vs_group2 <-
    read.delim(paste0("../../results/human_kidney_both_sexes/DEGs/", i,"_q1.00_Kidney.txt"))
    i <- gsub("_", " ", i)
  color_values <- vector()
  max <- nrow(group1_vs_group2)
  for (row in 1:max) {
    if (group1_vs_group2$adj.P.Val[row] < 0.05) {
      if (group1_vs_group2$logFC [row] > .25) {
        color_values <- c(color_values, 1)
      }
      else if (group1_vs_group2$logFC[row] < -.25) {
        color_values <- c(color_values, 2)
      }
      else {
        color_values <- c(color_values, 3)
      }
    }
    else{
      color_values <- c(color_values, 3)
    }
  }
  group1_vs_group2$color_adjpval_0.05 <- factor(color_values)
  data <- group1_vs_group2
  num <- subset(data, (adj.P.Val < 0.05 & logFC < -.25)  | (adj.P.Val < 0.05 & logFC > .25 ))
  # Identify up- and down-regulated genes
  up_num <- sum(data$logFC > .25 & data$adj.P.Val < 0.05)
  down_num <- sum(data$logFC < -.25 & data$adj.P.Val < 0.05)
  num <- nrow(num)
  if (num != 0) {
    up <- data[data$color_adjpval_0.05 == 1,]
    up10 <- up[1:10,]
    upFold <- subset(up, logFC > 1)
    upFold <- upFold[!(upFold$gene_name %in% up10$gene_name),]
    down <- data[data$color_adjpval_0.05 == 2,]
    down10 <- down[1:10,]
    downFold <- subset(down, logFC < -1)
    downFold <- downFold[!(downFold$gene_name %in% down10$gene_name),]
    if (!1 %in% unique(data$color_adjpval_0.05)) {
      my_colors <- c("blue", "gray")
    } else if (!2 %in% unique(data$color_adjpval_0.05)) {
      my_colors <- c("red", "gray")
    } else if (!1 %in% unique(data$color_adjpval_0.05) &&
               !2 %in% unique(data$color_adjpval_0.05)) {
      my_colors <- c("gray")
    } else {
      my_colors <- c("red", "blue", "gray")
    }
    hadjpval <- (-log10(max(data$P.Value[data$adj.P.Val < 0.05],
                            na.rm = TRUE)))
    negFC <- c(-.25)
    posFC <- c(.25) 
    bulk_vol_plot <-
      ggplot(data = data,
             aes(
               x = logFC,
               y = -log10(P.Value),
               color = color_adjpval_0.05
             )) +
      geom_point(alpha = 0.8, size = .7) +
      theme_bw() +
      theme(legend.position = "none") +
      scale_color_manual(values = my_colors) +
      labs(
        title = "",
        x = expression(log[2](FC)),
        y = expression(-log[10] ~ "(" ~ italic("p") ~ "-value)")
      )  +
      geom_hline(yintercept = hadjpval,
                 #  horizontal line
                 colour = "#000000",
                 linetype = "dashed") +
      geom_vline(xintercept = negFC,
                 #  horizontal line
                 colour = "#000000",
                 linetype = "dashed") +
      geom_vline(xintercept = posFC,
                 #  horizontal line
                 colour = "#000000",
                 linetype = "dashed") +
      ggtitle(paste0("human ",  i, "\nq < 0.05 & |log2FC| > 0.25")) +
      # geom_text_repel(
      #   data = up10,
      #   aes(
      #     x = logFC,
      #     y = -log10(P.Value),
      #     label = gene_name
      #   ),
      #   color = "maroon",
      #   fontface = "italic",
      #   size = 1.8,
      #   max.overlaps = getOption("ggrepel.max.overlaps", default = 5)
      # ) +
      # geom_text_repel(
      #   data = upFold,
      #   aes(
      #     x = logFC,
      #     y = -log10(P.Value),
      #     label = gene_name
      #   ),
      #   color = "maroon",
      #   fontface = "italic",
      #   size = 1.8,
      #   max.overlaps = getOption("ggrepel.max.overlaps", default = 5)
      # ) +
      # geom_text_repel(
      #   data = down10,
      #   aes(
      #     x = logFC,
      #     y = -log10(P.Value),
      #     label = gene_name
      #   ),
      #   color = "navyblue",
      #   fontface = "italic",
      #   size = 1.8,
      #   max.overlaps = getOption("ggrepel.max.overlaps", default = 3)
      # ) +
      # geom_text_repel(
      #   data = downFold,
      #   aes(
      #     x = logFC,
      #     y = -log10(P.Value),
      #     label = gene_name
      #   ),
      #   color = "navyblue",
      #   fontface = "italic",
      #   size = 1.8,
      #   max.overlaps = getOption("ggrepel.max.overlaps", default = 5)
      # ) +
  theme(
    axis.title.x = element_text(size = 8),
    axis.text.x = element_text(size = 8),
    axis.title.y = element_text(size = 8),
    axis.text.y = element_text(size = 8),
    legend.title = element_text(size = 8), 
    legend.text = element_text(size = 8),  
    plot.title = element_text(size = 8)    
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(-4, 4.5), breaks = seq(-4, 4.5, 2)) +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(0, 8.35), breaks = seq(0, 8, 2)) +
  annotate("text",
           x = 3.95, # Adjust x position as needed
           y = 8.35,    # Adjust y position as needed
           label = paste("Up =", up_num),
           color = "maroon",
           size = 2.5,
            fontface = "bold",
           hjust = 1, vjust = 1) +
  annotate("text",
           x = -3.95, # Adjust x position as needed
           y = 8.35,    # Adjust y position as needed
           label = paste("Down =", down_num),
           color = "navyblue",
           fontface = "bold",
           size = 2.5,
           hjust = 0, vjust = 1)
bulk_vol_plot 
    
  }
  }
```

```{r bulk_metascape}
remove(

up_and_down_enrich_plot <-
  ggplot(data = up_and_down_enrich_results_subset, aes(x = InTerm, y = Description)) +

 # ggtitle(paste0(tissue," enrichment summaries")) +

up_and_down_enrich_plot

addSmallLegend <- function(myPlot, pointSize = 3, textSize = 6, spaceLegend = .5) {
    myPlot +
        guides(shape = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size = pointSize)),
               color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size = pointSize))) +
        theme(legend.title = element_text(size = textSize), 
              legend.text  = element_text(size = textSize),
              legend.key.size = unit(spaceLegend, "lines"))
}

# Apply on original plot
up_and_down_enrich_plot <- addSmallLegend(up_and_down_enrich_plot)
```

```{r bulk_metascape}
# combine together

 up_and_down_enrich_results_subset$Description <-

addSmallLegend <- function(myPlot, pointSize = 3, textSize = 6, spaceLegend = .5) {
    myPlot +
        guides(shape = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size = pointSize)),
               color = guide_legend(override.aes = list(size = pointSize))) +
        theme(legend.title = element_text(size = textSize), 
              legend.text  = element_text(size = textSize),
              legend.key.size = unit(spaceLegend, "lines"))
}

# Apply on original plot
```
